name: FarmOut: The last Fall
description:
Description :

FarmOut is an RPG / Farming Simulation solo developed by MrLamino.

It was produced between September 1st 2021 and September 22nd 2021 for the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021.

Take control of an old farm abandoned for too long and stop the demonic plans of your neighbor “PumpkinAddict34”.

Grab your best pickaxe and your watering can, then go on an epic journey to save your world.

You only have 30 days!

Controls:

 ASWZD - Character direction

1/2/3/4/5 - Quick tool hotbar

TAB - Inventory

E - Interact

Left Mouse button - Use selected Quick Tool

Left arrow / Down arrow / Right arrow - Change camera angle

ENTER - ScreenShots

Known BUG :

  • Still somes errors on the farm and the planting system.
  • The Save system is not yet implemented.
  • My random dungeons aren't too random.
  • Missing random encounters

Feel free to send me feedback !
